data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Shift-Adjusted Ultrasound, Black Male, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPBWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOPBJS45: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROPBJS45: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBIBJS45: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBIBJS45: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBWT45
variable.description: Weight for LINBJS45: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBWT45
variable.description: Weight for RINBJS45: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LBI [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, RBI [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LIN [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, RIN [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: LOPBJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LOP [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, ROP [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: SUMWTB45
variable.description: Weight for MNB45_1S (=no. of obs sites/6) [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: MNB45_1S
variable.description: Mean of the JS45 variables [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 2]
